The upcoming sessions are listed in the calendar link. Copy this link to
subscribe to the calendar in your preferred calendar app.
<https://ics.teamup.com/feed/kswt65x9zk9rzobn1v/14409003.ics>

### Via the Region Web Outlook

1.  Go to Calendar.
2.  Click "Add calendar" button.
3.  Select "From internet" menu item.
4.  Copy and paste the URL into the fields given.

### Via the Desktop Outlook app

See the [Microsoft Support
Docs](https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/topic/cff1429c-5af6-41ec-a5b4-74f2c278e98c)
on subscribing to calendars.
